content.question: Federal budget entitlements refer to spending

choices.label: to provide individual benefits established by legislation
by legislators on trips to home states to confer with constituents
by congressional staff while traveling on official business
on behalf of life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness
targeted to benefit residents of specific congressional districts

content.answer: to provide individual benefits established by legislation

topic.text: 2.1: Congress: The Senate and the House of Representatives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
